phrases: When we started living in the same dorm together,
I figured trouble would come of it.
We started talking to each other about cats he had taken in,
and we even ended up in the same class in our second year.
Hall, a congregation of the school's problem students.
But being in such close proximity...
makes some things even harder to say.
Expressing these feelings out loud has gotten a lot more difficult.
just for the night on Christmas Eve?
No, I am not that interested.
He said he would see what he could do.
Is this really going to work?
Her publisher's throwing a party on the 24th...
You two are going on a date, so...
Get out from inside of me!
Since then, I have not really talked to Shiina.
What is this little skit all about?
Do not apologize if you do not understand.
Do not you have a lot to do before the end of the year?
I just told you, I am not angry!
How did I seem to you?
Will you be satisfied if I tell you that you are a bad person?
You have got to confess your feelings to him on the night...
Wh-Why do I have to do that?
is on the rocks, is not it?
And you have got a date with Kanda-kun on Christmas Eve, right?
Kanda-kun is taking Mashiro to a party...
and he is picking her up afterwards.
While he is waiting for her, we are just going to watch a play and get dinner.
What are you going to wear?
I have not really decided yet...
You have got to wear a skirt!
Do not get careless and wear denim or something like that!
Would you like to delete this entry?
you will get accepted into an art school in Osaka.
Is that something you should say to a friend...
who is working hard to get into the school of his choice?
Who are you calling your friend?
So, did you need something, Student Council President?
Are you serious about going to Osaka?
You sure you can cope with the distance?
I am sure you will have no trouble...
finding girls to mess around with as soon as you get there.
I already broke up with all the women...
I have been messing around with.
Besides, Misaki is not alone anymore.
Is there something else bothering you?
What do you want to do?
I want her to look at me.
She is already looking right at you.
That is because she loves me.
That is not what I mean.
I do not just want her to love me,
I want to make her love me.
Because I really do love her.
It makes me want to marry you, Nanamin!
I am not letting him see my underwear!
Kamiigusa-senpai, are you going to be okay?
Are not you afraid to tell him how you feel?
What are you talking about, Nanamin?
After all, I have liked Jin since elementary school.
Though, I did not realize how I felt until middle school.
But if I think about that even a little, it is all over.
Fear takes hold and propels me around the circle again!
I need to tell Jin how I feel!
I cannot live like this anymore!
Well, I guess it is not so bad the way things are now.
I get to be with Jin...
But I want to be closer to Jin!
What am I going to do if he goes away?
Which brings me right back here.
I have probably gone through it a hundred times since middle school.
Yeah, and I am starting to get sick of watching the same scenery go by.
I am going to close my eyes and leap!
Oh, that is not what I meant.
I am sure the stars are beautiful.
I am sure she had something in mind.
Not that I do not understand how you feel.
Anyone who is working hard would get angry...
when they see someone else slacking off.
There are certain lines you should not cross with your students.
You do not want me to go there because you understand, right?
You know Mashiro is not slacking off.
She just does not know how to face...
an emotion she is never felt before.
Mashiro does not know how to reconcile with someone.
What good will facing her with your own half-baked feelings do?
Are you telling me to apologize to her?
You are such a little kid.
Because if something is not white, you reckon it must be black.
The world is not that simple.
Most things are not that clear.
They are neither white nor black.
What am I supposed to do, then?
All I know is, if you become...
someone who can only accept his own ideal scenario,
you will make yourself and everyone around you unhappy.
Because I am on Mashiro Duty?
I am locking up Sakura Hall at the end of this year.
I am going to go have some fun in Australia.
You will all have to go home.
Feelings I do not know how to handle.
Feelings I do not know if I should convey.
Feelings I have decided not to convey yet.
Make sure you bring a cake.
She said to come by after 5pm.
You are a sight for sore eyes!
I am so cute, you are at a loss for words?
You look like you are pretty comfortable wearing that.
I have worn dresses to award ceremonies.
The rest is up to you, Jin-san.
You do not have to run.
Are you going to the Sakura Hall party?
We will be exchanging gifts, so do not forget to bring something.
Mashiro does not know how to reconcile with someone.
What good will facing her with your own half-baked feelings do?
It is the results of the audition.
You are not going to look?
I will take the princess from here.
I will leave her to you now.
Shiina, do not forget to greet people properly.
There is no need to act so surprised!
I just did not expect this.
That is not what I meant.
I think this side of you is not so bad.
Yeah, I was pretty taken aback.
Hey, stupid couples, go blow yourselves up!
Do not hang up on me!
For a country bumpkin like you to try to set a flag...
by sending something like this is inconceivable!
Just let me talk to Ryunosuke!
It is coming down pretty hard.
I wonder if any will stick.
I guess it is okay if snow falls on me...
You want me to hold it?
I am letting you use my umbrella, so the least you can do is hold it.
What did you think of the play?
It was interesting, but the actors also surprised me...
Yeah, I feel the same way when I play games.
Professionals are on a completely different level than us,
from their oratory skills to their acting talents...
We have got to work harder.
But, I guess that is not something I should say...
to someone who is already working really hard.
You think I am working hard?
There is an audition for an agency in February.
My parents told me to come back to Osaka...
if an agency does not hire me.
If I fail the audition, I will transfer schools and go back to Osaka.
If I pass, I will work for an agency while attending Suimei High.
Would you be sad if I left?
Actually, there is one more thing.
to hear what I have to say.
What do you want to tell me?
I will tell you then, not now!
Once I say it, things will change!
If the time comes and I am hesitating,
I want you to tell me...
I am not sure I understand, but sure.
The hotel staff said they saw her go outside.
Do you have any idea where she might have gone?
Yes, I have always loved you.
You idiot, what are you doing?
They disappeared somewhere while I was walking.
I wanted you to eat it.
You have been angry a lot recently.
There is a lot I want to talk to you about,
but you always look so unhappy.
I do not like it, so I tried to think of what I could do to help.
How could I make you happy?
How could I make you have fun?
This is all I can do.
That is right, I am mad.
I will worry about you if you disappear without saying anything.
They said you suddenly vanished and they could not find you.
I thought you might have been involved in an accident.
I thought my heart was going to stop.
Walking around here barefoot, cutting your finger...
You are a professional manga artist.
I think about you a lot.
It made me want to make lunch for you.
I did not think of you like this before.
I do not understand it myself.
I have never felt this way before.
Watching you draw manga gave me goosebumps.
You put all you had into drawing, never thinking about...
You put everything on the line so naturally.
Since then, I have not been able to take my eyes off you.
Since then, I have liked that about you.
So do not let me down.
I have my eyes on you.
How long are you two going to stand there like that?
How long have you been watching?
If you knew, it would make you want to die.
It is important, is not it?
Will you help me prepare for my presentation again?
What are we going to do?
Maybe they are getting it on.
D-Do not say it like that!
I tried really hard so we could be lovers,
I cannot treat you right the way I am now.
That is not fine at all.
What am I supposed to do, then?
You do not have to do anything.
You are fine the way you are.
I do not understand what you are saying.
I wanted Jin to hurt me today!
He is bringing three girls home with him.
It takes only the slightest stimulus for sons to grow up quickly.
